During World War II, certain Karabiner 98k rifles were selected for their exceptional accuracy and fitted with the ZF39 telescopic sight. These rifles were used by Nazi Germany as sniper rifles. In skilled hands, they had an effective range of up to 1000 metres.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: ZF-4 (included).
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: None (Barrel adapter kit needed to mount a silencer)
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS: Gunsmith weapon mod kit

During World War II, certain Karabiner 98k rifles were selected for their exceptional accuracy and fitted with the ZF39 telescopic sight. These rifles were used by Nazi Germany as sniper rifles. In skilled hands, they had an effective range of up to 1000 metres.
 This particular gun has an adapter that allows to attach a suppressor constructed by Forester.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: ZF-4 (included).
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: K98 Forester.

Modified version of the German WWII sniper rifle Mauser Karabiner 98k - another work of Forester, known for his love for the restoration and modernization of old captured weapons of the WWII era. The original wooden stock has been slightly lightened; a handguard is installed on its front part, allowing the installation of an additional night sight. The rifle is equipped with an excellent sniper scope manufactured by March, Japan.
 According to Forester, this rifle is more suitable for hunting intruders in the Red Forest than mutants.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: March (included), PN-23 "Nozzle"
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: K98 Forester.

A modified version of the WWII German sniper rifle Mauser Karabiner 98k. The wooden stock was replaced with a more organomic polymer one. The rifle is equipped with an excellent sniper scope manufactured by March, Japan. In the Zone, a rifle is used mainly for hunting mutants at long and over-long distances.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:

 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: K98 Forester. (Barrel adapter needed to mount a silencer)
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS: Gunsmith weapon mod kit
